application_details: affiant, a solicitor, lacked personal knowledge of the facts, relied on others' information, and did not seek court leave to argue based on his affidavit. A second affidavit attempted to address deficiencies but still violated Rule 82.
decision_reasoning: Both affidavits are struck out due to violations of Rules 81 and 82.
cause_of_action: Dispute over validity of affidavits filed in support of plaintiff's summary judgment motion.
procedure_followed: Defendant moved to strike affidavits; court reviewed applicable rules and analyzed compliance.
result_of_case: Motion granted; both affidavits struck out; no costs awarded.
